channel.title: Rob Hamilton on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Rob Hamilton on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: #MPCbros vs #TeamScript Debate
item.description: Intros Speaker 0: 00:01:08 Hello and welcome back to the Bitcoin.review. Today we have a very interesting show. It’s going to be a knife fight. Two men go into a room with one knife. One comes out. On my left side, Rindell for team MPC, weighing 64 kilobytes. On my right side, Rob for team script with variable sizing, so we don’t know. Is this already a loss? We don’t know, let’s find out.
